verses.verse: And thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8804> an altar <WH4196> to burn <WH4729> incense <WH7004> upon: of shittim <WH7848> wood <WH6086> shalt thou make <WH6213> <WH8799> it.

A cubit <WH520> shall be the length <WH753> thereof, and a cubit <WH520> the breadth <WH7341> thereof; foursquare <WH7251> <WH8803> shall it be: and two cubits <WH520> shall be the height <WH6967> thereof: the shofars <WH7161> thereof shall be of the same.

And thou shalt overlay <WH6823> <WH8765> it with pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091>, the top <WH1406> thereof, and the sides <WH7023> thereof round about <WH5439>, and the shofars <WH7161> thereof; and thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8804> unto it a crown <WH2213> of gold <WH2091> round about <WH5439>.

And two <WH8147> golden <WH2091> rings <WH2885> shalt thou make <WH6213> <WH8799> to it under the crown <WH2213> of it, by the two <WH8147> corners <WH6763> thereof, upon the two <WH8147> sides <WH6654> of it shalt thou make <WH6213> <WH8799> it; and they shall be for places <WH1004> for the staves <WH905> to bear <WH5375> <WH8800> it withal <WH1992>.
And thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8804> the staves <WH905> of shittim <WH7848> wood <WH6086>, and overlay <WH6823> <WH8765> them with gold <WH2091>.

And thou shalt put <WH5414> <WH8804> it before <WH6440> the vail <WH6532> that is by the ark <WH727> of the testimony <WH5715>, before <WH6440> the mercy seat <WH3727> that is over the testimony <WH5715>, where I will meet <WH3259> <WH8735> with thee.

And Aharon <WH175> shall burn <WH6999> <WH8689> thereon sweet <WH5561> incense <WH7004> every morning <WH1242>: when he dresseht <WH3190> <WH8687> the Menorahs <WH5216>, he shall burn incense <WH6999> <WH8686> upon it.

And when Aharon <WH175> lighteth <WH5927> <WH8687> the Menorahs <WH5216> at even <WH6153>, he shall burn incense <WH6999> <WH8686> upon it, a perpetual <WH8548> incense <WH7004> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> throughout your generations <WH1755>.

Ye shall offer <WH5927> <WH8686> no strange <WH2114> <WH8801> incense <WH7004> thereon, nor burnt sacrifice <WH5930>, nor meat offering <WH4503>; neither shall ye pour <WH5258> <WH8799> drink offering <WH5262> thereon.

And Aharon <WH175> shall make an atonement <WH3722> <WH8765> upon the shofars <WH7161> of it once <WH259> in a year <WH8141> with the blood <WH1818> of the sin offering <WH2403> of atonements <WH3725>: once <WH259> in the year <WH8141> shall he make atonement <WH3722> <WH8762> upon it throughout your generations <WH1755>: it is most <WH6944> holy <WH6944> unto the YY <WH3068>.
And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

When thou takest <WH5375> <WH8799> the sum <WH7218> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> after their number <WH6485> <WH8803>, then shall they give <WH5414> <WH8804> every man <WH376> a ransom <WH3724> for his soul <WH5315> unto the YY <WH3068>, when thou numberest <WH6485> <WH8800> them; that there be no plague <WH5063> among them, when thou numberest <WH6485> <WH8800> them.

This they shall give <WH5414> <WH8799>, every one that passeht <WH5674> <WH8802> among <WH5921> them that are numbered <WH6485> <WH8803>, half <WH4276> a shekel <WH8255> after the shekel <WH8255> of the sanctuary <WH6944>: (a shekel <WH8255> is twenty <WH6242> gerahs <WH1626>:) an half <WH4276> shekel <WH8255> shall be the offering <WH8641> of the YY <WH3068>.

Havahry one that passeht <WH5674> <WH8802> among them that are numbered <WH6485> <WH8803>, from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and above <WH4605>, shall give <WH5414> <WH8799> an offering <WH8641> unto the YY <WH3068>.

The rich <WH6223> shall not give more <WH7235> <WH8686>, and the poor <WH1800> shall not give less <WH4591> <WH8686> than half <WH4276> a shekel <WH8255>, when they give <WH5414> <WH8800> an offering <WH8641> unto the YY <WH3068>, to make an atonement <WH3722> <WH8763> for your souls <WH5315>.

And thou shalt take <WH3947> <WH8804> the atonement <WH3725> money <WH3701> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and shalt appoint <WH5414> <WH8804> it for the service <WH5656> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>; that it may be a memorial <WH2146> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, to make an atonement <WH3722> <WH8763> for your souls <WH5315>.
And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Thou shalt also make <WH6213> <WH8804> a laver <WH3595> of brass <WH5178>, and his foot <WH3653> also of brass <WH5178>, to wash <WH7364> <WH8800> withal: and thou shalt put <WH5414> <WH8804> it between the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> and the altar <WH4196>, and thou shalt put <WH5414> <WH8804> water <WH4325> therein.
For Aharon <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> shall wash <WH7364> <WH8804> their hands <WH3027> and their feet <WH7272> thereat:

When they go <WH935> <WH8800> into the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, they shall wash <WH7364> <WH8799> with water <WH4325>, that they die <WH4191> <WH8799> not; or when they come near <WH5066> <WH8800> to the altar <WH4196> to minister <WH8334> <WH8763>, to burn offering <WH6999> <WH8687> made by fire <WH801> unto the YY <WH3068>:

So they shall wash <WH7364> <WH8804> their hands <WH3027> and their feet <WH7272>, that they die <WH4191> <WH8799> not: and it shall be a statute <WH2706> for ever <WH5769> to them, even to him and to his seed <WH2233> throughout their generations <WH1755>.
Moreover the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Take <WH3947> <WH8798> thou also unto thee principal <WH7218> spices <WH1314>, of pure <WH1865> myrrh <WH4753> five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> shekels, and of sweet <WH1314> cinnamon <WH7076> half <WH4276> so much <WH4276>, even two hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572> shekels, and of sweet <WH1314> calamus <WH7070> two hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572> shekels,
And of cassia <WH6916> five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> shekels, after the shekel <WH8255> of the sanctuary <WH6944>, and of oil <WH8081> olive <WH2132> an hin <WH1969>:

And thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8804> it an oil <WH8081> of holy <WH6944> ointment <WH4888>, an ointment <WH7545> compound <WH4842> after the art <WH4639> of the apothecary <WH7543> <WH8802>: it shall be an holy <WH6944> anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081>.
And thou shalt anoint <WH4886> <WH8804> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> therewith, and the ark <WH727> of the testimony <WH5715>,
And the table <WH7979> and all his vessels <WH3627>, and the candlestick <WH4501> and his vessels <WH3627>, and the altar <WH4196> of incense <WH7004>,
And the altar <WH4196> of burnt offering <WH5930> with all his vessels <WH3627>, and the laver <WH3595> and his foot <WH3653>.
And thou shalt sanctify <WH6942> <WH8765> them, that they may be most <WH6944> holy <WH6944>: whatsoever toucheth <WH5060> <WH8802> them shall be holy <WH6942> <WH8799>.
And thou shalt anoint <WH4886> <WH8799> Aharon <WH175> and his sons <WH1121>, and consecrate <WH6942> <WH8765> them, that they may minister unto me in the Kohen's office <WH3547> <WH8763>.

And thou shalt speak <WH1696> <WH8762> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, This shall be an holy <WH6944> anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081> unto me throughout your generations <WH1755>.

Upon man's <WH120> flesh <WH1320> shall it not be poured <WH3251> <WH8799>, neither shall ye make <WH6213> <WH8799> any other like it, after the composition <WH4971> of it: it is holy <WH6944>, and it shall be holy <WH6944> unto you.

Whosoever <WH834> <WH376> compoundeth <WH7543> <WH8799> any like it, or whosoever putteth <WH5414> <WH8799> any of it upon a stranger <WH2114> <WH8801>, shall even be cut <WH3772> <WH8738> off from his people <WH5971>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Take <WH3947> <WH8798> unto thee sweet spices <WH5561>, stacte <WH5198>, and onycha <WH7827>, and galbanum <WH2464>; these sweet <WH5561> spices <WH5561> with pure <WH2134> frankincense <WH3828>: of each <WH905> shall there be a like <WH905> weight:

And thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8804> it a perfume <WH7004>, a confection <WH7545> after the art <WH4639> of the apothecary <WH7543> <WH8802>, tempered <WH4414> <WH8794> together, pure <WH2889> and holy <WH6944>:

And thou shalt beat <WH7833> <WH8804> some of it very small <WH1854> <WH8687>, and put <WH5414> <WH8804> of it before <WH6440> the testimony <WH5715> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, where I will meet <WH3259> <WH8735> with thee: it shall be unto you most <WH6944> holy <WH6944>.

And as for the perfume <WH7004> which thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8799>, ye shall not make <WH6213> <WH8799> to yourselves according to the composition <WH4971> thereof: it shall be unto thee holy <WH6944> for the YY <WH3068>.
Whosoever <WH834> <WH376> shall make <WH6213> <WH8799> like unto that, to smell <WH7306> <WH8687> thereto, shall even be cut off <WH3772> <WH8738> from his people <WH5971>.
